title: How to know if I passed the first nine weeks of high school? I currently have 3 F's and about 62% overall. Did I pass - Quora

response.answer_text: iIn most schools a 60% is a D- and that is passing but barely, a mild sneeze will be murder. However, even if over all you have 62% you are still faced with three classes that you FLUNKED, get ready for summer school. You probably will have to make those classes up, as I am betting they were required courses. So if you wish to graduate with your classmates, four years from now you need to get those grades up to passing. So get to work and quit goofing off. Now I’ll bet that is not what you expected or wanted to read.

It depends on the school. However most schools would consider a F as not passing. In order to pass a class you have to have a minimum grade in the class, which is different for every school. I personally don’t think that you passed those three classes since you got F’s in them. You better get the grade up to at least a C in order to guarantee passing.
3 Fs out of 5 or 6 subjects does not look very good. In any case, you don’t pass “nine weeks,” you pass a semester. So, make sure you actually do well in the finals so the Fs become at least Cs.
Much depends on the grading scale of the school and each individual teacher. Have a conference with each teacher to determine a grade and to go some extra assignments.
